item.description:
This is a meetup at the Gulu in downtown Salem. I ( John Dumas) will not be there as I must baby sit that Monday night. However Devon will host this meetup away from our usual place. I may change some of the details.

Multiple different card games will be played.

I hope you will all consider coming to play our very social version of Kitty Whist that has a great deal of randomness built into the game. Really if you have ever played a game where you must follow suit you know most of the game. After a few hands you will pick up the rest.

There is no charge for this meetup, BUT, please buy something from the restaurant, so we can justify using their space.

Challenge: bring someone new.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Card Night with Devon at the Gulu Monday, 11-8-2010
